column3: 2015. local florists send gifts frankie john faldik
column6: 2015. visitation will be held on thursday
column8: 2015 at tres hewell mortuary chapel from 5 to 7 p. m. funeral services will be friday
column10: 2015 at st. james catholic church beginning with the recitation of the rosary at 9:30 a. m. followed by the mass of christian burial at 10:00 a. m. with rev. msgr. dennis darilek officiating. interment will follow at st. james catholic cemetery. a reception will follow in the family center at st. james. frankie was born in sweet home
column12: 1925 to anton and annie (raz) faldik. frankie proudly served his country in the united states army having landed on normandy beach on day 1. he owned and operated faldiks gulf station in seguin for many years. he was formerly active in seguin little league where he served as league president. he enjoyed playing dominoes
column13: dancing and all knights of columbus and american legion h u wood post 245 activities. mostly cherished times were spent just being with family and friends. frankie is preceded in death by his parents
column15: anton tony faldik and joe faldik
column17: olga ingram. he is survived by his loving wife of 66 years
column18: miladie faldik; son ron faldik; daughter nancy faldik; grandchildren derek faldik
column21: and husband ryan; great grandson rivers bernhard; sisters ann patek
column24: bernadette bobbie wesch; brother george faldik and wife carole
column28: and other loving family members and friends. pallbearers will be ryan bernhard
column34: and carl jaks. honorary pallbearers will be joe wright
column37: and rivers bernhard. frankie will be missed and will be forever remembered as a loving husband
column41: brother and friend. memorial contributions may be made to st. james catholic church
